solution_line_template: If one bus leaves every half-hour, then during one hour, there are {buses_per_half_hour} + {buses_per_half_hour} = <<{buses_per_half_hour}+{buses_per_half_hour}={buses_per_hour}>>{buses_per_hour} buses that leave the station.
During {num_days} days {buses_per_hour} * {hours_per_day} * {num_days} = {total_buses} buses leave the station.
